source:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_SEQ_00Zukin has an eye for eggs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_SEQ_00 Schwierigkeitsanpassung (Job/Klasse darf nicht gewechselt werden)

Zukin hofft auf ein gutes Geschäft unter Freunden.

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_00<tab>Lure out tatsunoko with live ruby shrimp near Sakazuki and slay them for their roe.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_00<tab>An den Zielorten auf Sakazuki <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8DF3030502 /var> auslegen und Tatsunoko-Kaviar erbeuten

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tatsunoko roe to the cook at the Ruby Price.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_01<tab>Den Tatsunoko-Kaviar zum Koch der Rubin-Seefestung bringen

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fine Hingan wine to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the very <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was seeking. There is a task I would have you perform in the name of trade relations.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Hallo, Kojin-<var 08 E905 ((Freundin)) ((Freund)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hilfst du mir dabei, unsere freund<var 16 /var>schaft<var 16 /var>lichen Bande zu Kugane zu<var 1D /var>...... festigen?

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Take these live ruby shrimp and release them along the shore of Sakazuki. This will lure out tatsunoko, whose roe you may then harvest.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Es ist ganz einfach! Lege diese lebhaften Rubingarnelen auf der Insel Sakazuki aus. Tatsunoko können diesem Köder nicht widerstehen. Erlege sie und entnimm ihnen ihre Fischeier.

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Once you have the roe, pray deliver it to the cook at the Ruby Price. He will know what to do with it. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Den Kaviar bringst du dann bitte zum Koch der Rubin-Seefestung. Viel Erfolg!

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_020<tab>Looking for the cook? You've found him. What is it you require?
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_020<tab>Hallo! Ich bin für die Versorgung der Seefestung zuständig. Hast du mir etwas anzubieten?

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_021<tab>Oho, if this isn't tatsunoko roe, and some of the freshest I've seen! Compliments of Zukin, you say? Well, how thoughtful of him!
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_021<tab>Oh, Tatsunoko-Kaviar! Den hatte ich bei Zukin bestellt. Vielen Dank, dass du den Kaviar geliefert hast!

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_022<tab>In case you didn't know, tatsunoko roe is a rare delicacy. I'll be able to prepare such a treat for our troops as they seldom enjoy! Now, such kindness shouldn't go unacknowledged...
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_022<tab>Tatsunoko-Kaviar ist eine beliebte Delikatesse. So etwas Feines kann ich unserer Mannschaft nicht oft kredenzen. Dafür möchte ich mich gerne bei Zukin erkenntlich zeigen.

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_023<tab>One of the finest wines I have in my stores. Please give it to Zukin along with my regards. And with that, I take my leave─I have a feast to prepare!
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_023<tab>Bester Reiswein aus Hingashi! Überbringe ihn bitte Zukin als Zeichen unserer Freund<var 16 /var>schaft. So, jetzt muss ich mich aber ums Essen kümmern. Mach's gut!

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>...Our gift was so well received that we received one in return? Wonderful!
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, du bist zurück! Hast du den Kaviar abgeliefert, und mir vielleicht sogar etwas<var 1D /var>...... mitgebracht?

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_031<tab><sniff> Ah, this is truly a fine rice wine. We've not the means to brew our own, so it is doubly appreciated. My thanks for handling the task, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_031<tab>Ohhh, der riecht aber lecker! Ein kostbares Geschenk, denn Reiswein können wir hier nicht selbst<var 1D /var>...... herstellen. Besonders freue ich mich über die Freund<var 16 /var>schaft, die der Koch damit zum Ausdruck bringt!

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>Ever since we began trading with Kokajiya, travel to Kugane has become a regularity. This in turn led to more opportunities for contact with the Ruby Price.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>Seit du Kontakt zwischen uns und der Kokajiya-Schmiede hergestellt hast, besuchen viele von uns Kugane. Auf dem Weg machen wir ganz gerne auch an der Seefestung<var 1D /var>...... Halt.

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_033<tab>For now, the fortification serves simply as a convenient waypoint, but ere long it will become a destination in its own right. Our efforts to establish new trade channels continue to flourish, and we owe no small part of our success to you.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_033<tab>Hoffentlich können wir dort weiterhin so gute Geschäfte<var 1D /var>...... machen. Vielen, vielen Dank!
